sentences.english: Um…I just read about a short bird, the plover.
sentences.chinese: 我剛剛讀了一些關於一種叫珩科鳥的鳥。

sentences.english: Hope you all can remember me, Wangqihang, a happy guy like the sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 希望大家能記住我，王啓珩，一個陽光般的快樂男孩。

sentences.english: It is complex in the design of gear cutting tool such as honer.
sentences.chinese: 作爲齒輪刀具的珩齒刀設計複雜。

sentences.english: Photo of my neighbour Hengheng and I played together.
sentences.chinese: 這是我跟鄰居家的珩珩一起玩耍的照片。

sentences.english: Ultrasonic parallel-axes honing is a new machining method of gear-honing.
sentences.chinese: 超聲波平行軸硬珩齒是一種新型的齒輪精加工方法。
